alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Cluster of Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Las Animas County through 300 PM MDT... At 223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hoehne to 6 miles east of Trinidad to near Raton Pass. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Cokedale, Starkville, Hoehne and Raton Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
